_comments: To DISABLE error posting set errorsChannel to false
errorMessage: :disappointed: An error occured. Please check server's Logs.
tokenAddedMessage: Your token has been succesfully received! :thumbsup:

GithubApp.tokenStoredMsg: Github App Generated and Stored a new Token

jenkins.jobNotFoundMsg:
Job/Build not found. :thinking_face: Please try again.
Make sure to tell me the correct job/build name.
jenkins.badCredentialsMsg:
Hey, it seems that your Jenkins credentials are wrong!
Say `jenkins login` to login again.

questions.text: What obstacles are impeding your progress?
Is there anything else you want to mention?
